orders.description: Seasoned potato skins covered in bacon, cheese, scallions, and sour cream

orders.description: Nachos piled high with taco beef, nacho cheese, pico de gallo, cilantro, and jalapenos.  Sub Chicken 1.99 Sub Steak 2.99

orders.name: Hawaiian Burger
